properties.publicRemarks:
STUNNING REMODELED ESTATE IN THE CATHEDRAL CITY COVE WITH BREATHTAKING VIEWS!
Perched at the top of the historic Cathedral City Cove, this completely remodeled 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom home (plus a spacious detached 1 bed, 1 bath casita with full kitchenette) offers the perfect blend of luxury, privacy, and investment potential. Every detail of this home has been well thought out including a dedicated space for a home office and leased solar for energy efficiency at an affordable price of only $296 a month. From the moment you step inside, you'll be captivated by the open floor plan and high ceilings with panoramic views of the surrounding mountain range. As you continue on through the expansive sliding glass doors, you will come upon your own private and secluded back patio area with a newly resurfaced pool and spa. 
Back inside, all bedrooms are generously sized with their own custom built walk in closets. Each bathroom has been designed to be state of the art with only the finest of features to provide maximum comfort. 
Designed for the discerning chef, the large gourmet kitchen boasts ample cabinet space, high end counter top finishes, and top-of-the-line professional grade appliances, With a lot that is over 16,000 square feet, there is a gated area for RV, boat, or off road vehicle parking with enough additional space for a private garden, meditation retreat, or any personal sanctuary that you may envision. Whether you are looking for a dream home, a vacation retreat, or income generating property, this exceptional residence delivers it all. CALL TODAY FOR YOUR OWN PRIVATE SHOWING. SELLER TO CONTRIBUTE $5,000 TOWARDS CLOSING COSTS WITH AN ACCEPTED OFFER AT THE CLOSE OF ESCROW. WITH ITS RECENT PRICE IMPROVEMENT OF $70,000, THIS HOME IS NOW WELL BELOW MARKET VALUE!
